name: Bull Shop - Don't Break Anything
description:
Created for the 48 GMTK game jam. Solo project just to mess around and have fun!

Don't let your unruly pet bull wreck all your expensive dishes! See how long you can last before the first plate gets broken. Share your highscores!

Controls:

  • WASD or Gamepad Joystick
  • Enter to Start playing
  • Esc to Quit

Credits:

  • Bull Model from Santiago
  • Character, plates,  and table models from Kenney's Free Assets
  • Sound Effects from Digital Systemic Emulations
  • Simple IK script from Wire Wiz
  • Music from Kevin MacLeod
